TEXT.TITLE: LOWE'S <LOW> MAY SALES UP 11 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Lowe's Cos Inc said its sales for the four weeks ended May 29 were up 11 pct to 221.0 mln dlrs from 199.5 mln dlrs a year before, with same-store sales up five pct. Reuter
